Text.Page:
If you defeated the insectivorous plant,
I have a lot of faith that you'll triumph!

In that cave, is a three-way path.
You'll need to defeat the gatekeepers, on each of the paths to open the door.

Your toughest fight will probably be in the Cave of the Vesporax.
When the hornet sprays venom on the ground,
just run.

Also, watch out for small hornets,
and try to use the parasites in the cave to your advantage.

Good luck!
